DOC.brief_summary: Title : Safety efficacy fentanyl citrate combination midazolam critically ill child mechanical ventilation Objective : To evaluate safety efficacy fentanyl citrate combination midazolam child mechanical ventilation . Design : Double-blind randomized control study Patients : Patients age 2 month 18 year admit Seoul National University Hospital pediatric intensive care unit , applied mechanical ventilation . Interventions : After enrollment patient , blind reagent ( fentanyl citrate normal saline ) prepare assigned pharmacist . Investigators , caregiver , patient , parent patient n't know whether blind reagent fentanyl citrate , prepare pharmacist know . Protocol : All enrol patient receive continuous infusion midazolam blind reagent . The start time study continuous infusion midazolam blind reagent begin . Assigned research nurse check Comfort behavior scale patient every hour regularly , whenever patient seem overactive . Endpoint study 48 hour begin . If adverse effect unexpected event , however , study early terminate .
DOC.detailed_description: Comfort behavior scale consist 7 component alertness , calmness , respiratory response , cry , physical movement , muscle tone , facial tension . Because intubated patient evaluate 'crying ' , however , use 6 component among total 7 component , except 'crying ' . Adverse effect fentanyl include hypotension , coma , ileus . Unexpected event mean situation study last , withdrawal consent , necessity drug affect level consciousness patient , emergent interventional procedure , etc .
